modal.confirmationDeleteBookMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this book? This action cannot be undone.
modal.confirmationDeleteBookshelfMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this bookshelf? This action cannot be undone and all books within it will be lost.
modal.createBookshelfDescription: Start your personal library by creating a new bookshelf.
modal.enterEditTokenDescription: Paste the secret token you received when creating your bookshelf to open it for editing.
modal.enterPublicIdToVisit: Enter the Public ID to visit a Bookshelf
modal.enterPublicIdToVisitDescriptionStart: Each bookshelf has a unique Public ID.
modal.enterPublicIdToVisitDescriptionEnd: Paste one below to see what’s inside.
modal.exportBooksDescription: You can export the list of books in this bookshelf as a JSON for backup or sharing purposes.
modal.importBooksDescription: You can import a list of books into your bookshelf from a JSON.
modal.rememberToken: Remember this token on this device
modal.saveTokenPurpose: You’ll need it to access, edit, or delete your bookshelf.
modal.saveTokenInstruction: It’s only shown once — save it somewhere secure.

placeholders.enterReadCount: Enter how many times you've read this book
